channel.title: DFS Problem
channel.description: How do I change how much teh dfs special ability does? because it's over powered in pk and is hitting 60's and I want it to hit 30s

item.title: DFS Problem
item.dc:creator: @bello33 bello33
item.description:
@bello33 wrote:

I think it would be something to do with 2nd option but you could do so it randomly does it every 30 - 120sec if the shield id is = dfs id

Read full topic

item.title: DFS Problem
item.dc:creator: @_N_eon (N)eon
item.description:
@_N_eon wrote:

Im pretty sure its combatAssistant.java, Under The DFS id and such it should say " Spec amount " and " Spec Power "

Or something like that…

Read full topic

item.title: DFS Problem
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“Alecrespawn, post:3, topic:417426”][quote author=devenb123 link=topic=519977.msg3775667#msg3775667 date=1318087299]
well if its overpowered look in item.cfg for spec idk if its same
sorry
[/quote]

item.cfg only gives stats? have you coded before :S[/quote]

Search for ‘11283’ in your server. Try opening files that are like ‘CombatAssistant’, ‘CombatManager’, ‘…Assistant’, ‘ActionHandler’ or some shit like that. Don’t go around opening ‘Client.java’ looking for it, because it’s a waste of time.

Read full topic
